name: Ocean Cleanup (ChePhan)
description:
The ocean is littered with garbage, we have to clean it up!

Movement W A S D or Arrow Keys

Interact E / [SPACE]

Toggle Fullscreen F11

Restart Shift + R

Important notice: The web build is broken (probably due to an export error in the engine. Please use the windows version for the full "experience".

Description

Dive down the ocean and remove the garbage from the ocean floor. But wait, there are many creatures caught up in garbage. Free them poor creatures and you are no longer alone in your endeavor. They will help you clean up.

How much garbage can you remove before your oxygen runs out.
